content.text:
Here is my response:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To support the development of training materials and technical manuals:
• Gather input from subject matter experts on key processes, procedures, and technical information that needs to be documented
• Organize content in a clear, logical flow, breaking it into manageable sections and subsections
• Use simple language, avoiding jargon and acronyms where possible; define key terms
• Incorporate visuals like diagrams, flowcharts, and screenshots to illustrate complex concepts
• Develop hands-on exercises and knowledge checks to reinforce learning
• Have the drafts reviewed by both experts and novices to validate technical accuracy and ease of understanding
• Maintain the materials over time, updating as needed to reflect process changes or new information
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
